name: VCHAT Token
description: VCHAT Token (VCT) is a next-generation Web3 project building the world’s first Interaction Mining platform, rewarding users for every meaningful digital action—likes, comments, transactions, and more. Built on Binance Smart Chain, VCT introduces a fair, transparent, and user-centric model for the $800B advertising industry. With DAO governance, audited smart contracts, multi-chain support, and an ecosystem spanning e-commerce, AI, and NFTs, VCT empowers users to turn engagement into real value while driving the evolution of a decentralized digital economy.
